titleStmt.title: An antidote against the poysonous vveeds of heretical blasphemies, which during the deplorable interval of church-government have grown up in the reforming Church of England. As it was lately presented to the Church of God at Great Yarmouth. / By Iohn Brinsley, Minister of the Gospel there. Augus. 10. 1650. Imprimatur, Edm. Calamy.
titleStmt.author: Brinsley, John, 1600-1665.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.R. & E.M. for Ralph Smith at the singe of the blew Bible in Corn-hill neer the Royal Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
